name: No time for everything
description:
~Sometimes in our lives we have to sacrifice certain things in order to achieve other ones ~

We have made a game (in a few hours of our free time :P) in which you must make decisions and decide which things to put aside.

The art of the game is made by programmers! We hope you like it!

Play, enjoy and leave a comment if you want. We will be playing LD games as soon as we can!

Developers:
- Ricardo Roldan (@rickyrf95) programmer
- Alejandro Benítez (@BenitezDev) programmer

>> LumunDare43 >> Theme: Sacrifices must be made
